Class HDBManagerUI

java.lang.Object
boundary.HDBManagerUI
All Implemented Interfaces:
ApplicationProcessingUI, EnquiryManagerUI, ManagerMenuUI, OfficerManagementUI, ProjectManagementManagerUI, ReportGenerationUI
public class HDBManagerUI extends Object implements ProjectManagementManagerUI, OfficerManagementUI, ApplicationProcessingUI, ReportGenerationUI, EnquiryManagerUI, ManagerMenuUI
The HDBManagerUI class serves as the command-line interface for users with the HDB Manager role in the BTO Management System. It provides functionalities for creating, managing, and deleting BTO projects, approving officer and applicant registrations, generating filtered reports, and responding to enquiries. This class implements: - ProjectManagementManagerUI - OfficerManagementUI - ApplicationProcessingUI - ReportGenerationUI - EnquiryManagerUI - ManagerMenuUI

    • HDBManagerUI

      public HDBManagerUI(ProjectController projectController, ApplicationController applicationController, EnquiryController enquiryController, ManagerController managerController, AuthenticationController authController, FilterController filterController)
      Constructs an HDBManagerUI with the specified controllers.
      Parameters:
      projectController - controller for handling project-related actions
      applicationController - controller for managing applications
      enquiryController - controller for managing enquiries
      managerController - controller for manager-specific functionality
      authController - controller for user authentication and profiles
      filterController - controller for applying and retrieving project filters
